ROOT.QUERY:
/***********************************************************************/ /* Query : Report item can belong to only 1 PPG */ /***********************************************************************/
WITH PPGLIST AS ( SELECT arvcexr,arvcinr, arvcinv, COUNT(DISTINCT dlinlis) CNT FROM ( SELECT arvcexr,arvcinr, arvcinv, dlinlis FROM artuv@heinens_custom_prod, artdetlist@heinens_custom_prod, artentlist@heinens_custom_prod WHERE elinlis LIKE ''PPG%'' AND dlinlis=elinlis AND dlicinv=arvcinv AND trunc(dlidfin) > trunc(sysdate) AND TRUNC(dliddeb) > to_date(''01/01/01'',''MM/DD/RR'')) GROUP BY arvcexr, arvcinr, arvcinv HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT dlinlis) > 1 ) SELECT arvcexr "Item code", pkstrucobj.get_desc@heinens_custom_prod(1,arvcinr, ''HN'') "Description", pkartcoca.get_code_caisse@heinens_custom_prod(1,arvcinv, TRUNC(SYSDATE)) UPC, ''['' || (SELECT LISTAGG( elinlis || '' | '' || elilibl, ''; '' ON OVERFLOW TRUNCATE) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY elinlis DESC) FROM artentlist@heinens_custom_prod, artdetlist@heinens_custom_prod WHERE elinlis LIKE ''PPG%'' AND dlinlis=elinlis AND dlicinv=arvcinv AND trunc(dlidfin) > trunc(sysdate)) || '']'' "PPG list" FROM PPGLIST
